alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 12:17PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL TAYLOR COUNTY THROUGH 1245 PM EDT... At 1216 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Perry, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Jug Island, Secotan, Boyd, Smith, Carbur, Adams Beach, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Foley, Blue Springs, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Athena, Hampton Springs, Cedar Island, and Fenholloway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
